content:
Is there a method (e.g. via manage.py) to change the email address of all users under a domain?
e.g. fbloggs@example.com -> fbloggs@example.org
I might have to change the username as well for some or all users
e.g. fbloggs@example.com -> fred.a.bloggs@example.org
(assume that a text file containing the old/new emails is available as input)
There's a change_user_email management script that you could call for multiple users using a script that you write, or you could hack the script itself to take input a file.
Thanks, that should work; and renaming the realm itself can be done through UI
